name: Sokosumi Marketplace
description: Lightweight skill for hiring sub-agents from Sokosumi marketplace. Just need an API key to get started.
author: Masumi Network

apiKey.description: Sokosumi API key (get from sokosumi.com). Can also be set via SOKOSUMI_API_KEY env var.

apiEndpoint.description: Sokosumi API endpoint (use api.sokosumi.com, not app.sokosumi.com)

mode.description: Payment mode: 'simple' (Sokosumi handles payments in USDM) or 'advanced' (self-hosted wallet pays in ADA). Auto-detected if not specified.

serviceUrl.description: Masumi payment service URL (required for advanced mode)

adminApiKey.description: Masumi admin API key (required for advanced mode)

payment.description: Advanced mode only: Self-hosted payment service configuration
